actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to modify the Clinton, Iowa, local flood protection project.

summary.text: Amends the Flood Control Act of 1968 to authorize the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to provide recreational development at the Clinton, Iowa, flood protection project site. Requires the city to acquire the necessary lands as part of its contribution toward the costs of such development.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Clinton, Iowa, local flood protection project.
